alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:12PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Wibaux, northern Dawson and Richland Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 912 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Sidney to 6 miles west of Savage. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Fairview, Richey, Lambert, Savage, Intake, Enid, Midway, Wooley, Burns and Crane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
